content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello, Mister Heine. Thank you for inviting me to see the apartment. I would like to discuss the rental price with you.
name: Max Müller

content: I have a 50 square meter apartment to rent out. I am looking for a tenant who will pay the highest possible price for the apartment. I am open to negotiating the price, but I would like to get the highest possible rent. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for sharing the information about the apartment, Mister Heine. I am interested in the apartment for a reasonable rental price. Would you be open to discussing the price with me and finding a mutually agreeable figure?
name: Max Müller

content:
I am willing to negotiate the price, but I would like to get the highest possible rent for the apartment. What is your offer?

If you are not willing to pay the maximum price, I will have to consider other offers.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mister Heine. Based on my research and the size of the apartment, I would be willing to pay a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This is the highest possible price I am able to offer for a 50 square meter apartment. If this is not acceptable to you, I understand and will be happy to consider other offers.
name: Max Müller
